ing: 1 (4 roll) package Hawaiian bread rolls, split
n: Easy Peezy Sweet Toasted Cheese Sandwich
des: "I eat this for breakfast sometimes. It goes great with a cup of coffee. All you need is a toaster oven."
ins:
Top each bread roll half with a slice of Cheddar cheese.
Toast topped rolls in toaster oven until cheese is melted, 5 to 7 minutes.
Sprinkle sugar over the melted cheese.
